description.name: cPanel Licensing
description.tagline: Provision, Manage, and Bill for cPanel licenses.
description.short: The cPanel Licensing Automation module for WHMCS allows cPanel Partners to manage, provision and bill for cPanel licenses using WHMCS.
description.long:
The cPanel Licensing Automation module for WHMCS automates and simplifies the process of selling cPanel licenses with automated syncronisation and billing functionality.

Note that you must be a cPanel Partner in order to be able to use this module.
features: Ability to offer the full range of new cPanel Licenses via Configurable Options
Automated provisioning of cPanel licenses via the cPanel Licensing API
Support for provisioning both fixed and auto-scaling license types

Automated update/sync of auto-scaling licenses along with automated calculation of billing price
* Ability to manage cPanel licenses from within WHMCS
A simplified UX for managing cPanel License configurable options and pricing
